404.message: Sorry, this page does not exist

about.text:
I'm a Bachelor of Science in Mathematics, with a minor in Computer Science.
I have a love for problem solving and computers. That's how I ranked high in many national championships (in Mathematics and Computer Science).
I've been working as a web developer for a few years now, trying to write good code.
about.title: About Me

contact.cta: Would you like to work with me?
contact.title: Contact

hero.title: Hi, my name is
hero.name: Josef Wittmann
hero.text:
I'm a Full Stack Software Developer
and a Bachelor of Science in Mathematics.

bachelor.title: Extension Complexity of Convex n-Gons
bachelor.info: My bachelor thesis in mathematics at the Technical University of Munich.
bachelor.info2: Supervised by Prof. Dr. Stefan Weltge.

minesweeper.title: Minesweeper with Solver
minesweeper.info: This project is a simple minesweeper game with an automatic solver, which computes a probability distribution of mines.
minesweeper.info2: Press `P` for probabilities and `S` for solving according to probabilities.

codeJam.title: Google Coding Competitions
codeJam.info: Attempting Google's Coding Competitions with my favorite scientific programming language: Julia!

mailchimp.title: Mailchimp Inactive Subscriber Cleaning
mailchimp.info: Remove inactive subscribers by sending a campaign with a confirmation link to tagged subscribers.

voxelGame.title: Three.js Voxel Game
voxelGame.info: Learning 3D with three.js by building a voxel game.

tableTennisHandicap.title: Table Tennis Tournament Handicap
tableTennisHandicap.info: Fun little idea on how to make our club tournament more fair.
tableTennisHandicap.info2: Using basic probability theory and player rankings to introduce handicaps.

screepsWall.title: Screeps Wall Placement
screepsWall.info: Re-useable script for optimal wall placement in the programming game Screeps.
screepsWall.info2: Using Dinic's algorithm and the max-flow min-cut theorem.

career-break.title: Career Break
career-break.text: Had to figure out a health issue that resulted in me being very tired and fatigued. Traveled by bike through Germany after being well again.

ampeers.title: Backend Developer
ampeers.text: Main task: Migrating a JavaScript/REST/OracleDB backend service to TypeScript/GraphQL/ArangoDB. Planning, implementing and testing.

cosuno-lead.title: Lead Full Stack Developer
cosuno-lead.text: Apart from developing, I was responsible for discussing new features with product and design, making architectural decisions, reviewing code and unblocking and onboarding team members.

cosuno.title: Full Stack Developer
cosuno.text: Start-up: SaaS for managing construction projects. I was building and testing full features (frontend and backend) in TypeScript in an agile team.

qaware.title: Working Student
qaware.text: Maintenance of a Java web application for the security checking process for Telekom projects. My tasks were mostly frontend centered, but also involved some bug-fixing on the Java backend.

createrawvision.title: WordPress Developer
createrawvision.text: Building and maintaining a WordPress Website for more than 100 members. Notable features: Members area and integration to a custom payment gateway.

tum.title: B.Sc. Mathematics major, Computer Science minor
tum.text: Final grade: 1.9. Main focus: Optimization & Algorithms

bwinf.title: Top 100 in national computer science championship
